be 14 16 14 16 O
between 17 24 17 24 O
16 25 27 25 27 B-lower_bound

20 28 30 28 30 B-upper_bound
months 31 37 31 37 I-upper_bound
of 38 40 38 40 O
age 41 44 41 44 B-age
